content: MVA-Z ventilation support Galvanized air duct bracket for fastening light ventilation ducts overhead ### Categories: Home > Products > Modular support systems > Standard fixings for support systems- - - ### FEATURES:Features Easy-to-install threaded rod suspension system for ventilation ducts Built-in acoustic insulation with through-hole and preassembled U-washer for M8/M10 threaded rods Height adjustment possible even after installation Insulation can be installed over the bracket Hole size/shape suitable for self-drilling screws (4.2) and blind rivets Applications Fastening rectangular air ducts to ceilings ### TECHNICAL DATA: Thread connection - M: M8, M10 Noise reduction: 18 dB (A) Maximum load - F: 500 N Technical Data | Noise reduction | 18 dB (A) | Material composition | DD11 steel - DIN EN 10111, EPDM | Surface finish | Indoor Coated - Electro galvanized | Environmental conditions | Dry indoor conditions (C1) Indoor with temporary condensation (C2) | Hardness Insulation Material | 60° ±5° Shore A | Temperature resistance | -40 - 230 °F ### ITEMS- 386532 - Air duct bracket MVA-Z - Package Size 50 pc
